body:
I am making the only worth while thread while the staff and players run spears into each other's heads.
Pokemon is a video game and you do stuff in it. So what do you do in the game?
Make competitive teams
Play Nuzlockes
Play through the story
Wondertrade
Speedrun
Play the old games.

For older players what do you do? Do you do any of the things I mentioned before?
What are the pokemon you use in competition. Do you make theme teams? Do you just not like competition and play for fun? What is your favorite Pokemon. Discuss things here. If people want I will make a Skype group. Also to the people that think this is childish. You are playing a block game most likely flaming at a kid on the forums. Gg
body_tagged:

For older players what do you do? Do you do any of the things I mentioned before?
What are the pokemon you use in competition. Do you make theme teams? Do you just not like competition and play for fun? What is your favorite Pokemon. Discuss things here. If people want I will make a Skype group. Also to the people that think this is childish. You are playing a block game most likely flaming at a kid on the forums. Gg

replies.body:
Maybe replace Hidden Power with Lava Plume, it's a better Fire move to have when your Camerupt's HP is low. Eruption's damage decreases with HP.

As for the EV's.. if you're running 252-attack, you should at least have EQ, unless the attack stat isn't worth giving it EQ. The Speed isn't necessary, since Camerupt doesn't outspeed much lol. Maybe replace the EV with Special Defense?

Everything seems good for now though, I like the Rock Polish usage in there.
replies.body_tagged:

People who make the unexpected can thrive and the physical Gardivour set is unexpected and will throw the players off.

replies.body: Tell me this. Did you think Pachirisu was a good spot before 3 years ago? The physical Gardivour is still unknown to you and you believe it is a waste of time. I am someone who got bored of the main meta and decided to bend some stuff. Also it sadly wasn't even my idea. A friend of mine is amazing at the game but doesn't take it seriously so he tries out stuff. He showed his Gardivour in battle and I also thought he was an idiot. When he almost wiped my team with it I had to know how to use it and what its move set was. I am now like him. I don't take the game extremely seriously and I try what others call stupid.
